paper_metadata.title: Can the World Feed its Growing Population? [EJDR Special Debate Forum]

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: The target of halving the proportion of people suffering from hunger has only marginally improved since 1990 | According to the United Nations, nearly a quarter of children in developing countries under the age of five are expected to remain undernourished in 2015
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: This EDJR Special Debate Forum... We posed this question to renowned experts in agricultural economics, economic policy, environment and nutrition to provide insights from their respective fields
